Ad.Title: Why settle for better when you could settle for the best?
Ad.Content: Always aim for the best, you deserve it!

Ad.Title: Absolute Power Corrupts... Enjoy!
Ad.Content: With Great Power Comes Great Responsibility!

Ad.Title: If TV's so bad for you, why is there one in every hospital room?
Before TV, two world wars. After TV, zero.
Ad.Content: Everyone could use some Dark Humour once in a while...
